body: <white>You take a moment to assess how damaged your limbs are:
<white>Your input, 'ph' is not a valid command. Type HELP BASECOMMANDS for a list of common commands.

<#cdcd00><#00cdcd>A small depressant pill lies here. There are 3 reishis in a stack here. A small euphoriant pill lies here. A small decongestant pill lies here. There are 2 opiate pills in a stack here. There are 4 bergenias in a stack here. <white>

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="north"north/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northeast"northeast/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="southwest"southwest/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="west"west/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<#cdcd00><#ffffff>An arcane snowstorm veils the area with bone-biting, impenetrable white. <#00ffff>Tesai is here. She wields a throwing axe in her left hand and a throwing axe in her right.<white>

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="east"east/SEND/COLOR, COLOR #800080SEND HREF="northwest"northwest/SEND/COLOR, and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<#e5e5e5>Tesai chops into your head with a powerful draw of a throwing axe, the blade sinking into your flesh.
<#e5e5e5>You parry the attack to your head with a deft maneuver.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;bedazzle Tesai;;hypnotise Tesai;;suggest Tesai Hypochondria;;shadow sleight void Tesai
<#e5e5e5>You sprinkle some silvery powder over Tesai and grin widely as she looks about with a look of slight bafflement on her face.
<white>You fix Tesai with an entrancing stare, and smile in satisfaction as you realise that her mind is yours.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Tesai's mind.
<#e5e5e5>You order your shadow to surround Tesai in a black void.
<white>Tesai presses a caloric poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white>Tesai presses a caloric poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai chops into your right leg with a powerful draw of a throwing axe, the blade sinking into your flesh.
<white>You jerk your body to the side, lessening the blow.
<white>You watch, in horror, as your left arm shrivels up and becomes useless.
<white>You press a mending poultice against your left arm, rubbing it into your flesh.
<white>The bones in your left arm mend.
<white>When you can act: stand;;bedazzle Tesai;;suggest Tesai Impatience
<white>Tesai presses a caloric poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<#e5e5e5>You sprinkle some silvery powder over Tesai and grin widely as she looks about with a look of slight bafflement on her face.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Tesai's mind.
<white>You are again able to absorb a poultice.

<white>The bones in your left arm mend.
<white>You are again able to absorb a poultice.

<white>You may influence the shadows once more.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.

<#e5e5e5>Tesai sharply whistles a rapid cadence, each piercing note distracting your attention, your focus wavering and gaze darting this way and that as the sounds echo.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai chops into your head with a powerful draw of a throwing axe, the blade sinking into your flesh.
<#e5e5e5>Twisting your body, you dodge the attack.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;parry right leg;;envenom whip with curare;;flay Tesai;;suggest Tesai Hypochondria;;shadow sleight void Tesai
<white>You will now attempt to parry attacks to your right leg.
<white>You rub some curare on an iron-tipped whip.
<#e5e5e5>You send an iron-tipped whip to flay Tesai, lashing out with the tip.
<#e5e5e5>She seems to jolt as the speed defence is flayed from her.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of curare has rubbed off your weapon.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai frowns as she struggles with numbed motion.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Tesai's mind.
<#e5e5e5>You order your shadow to surround Tesai in a black void.
<white>Tesai presses a caloric poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white>Tesai takes a drink from a carved black raven vial.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai chops into your head with a powerful draw of a throwing axe, the blade sinking into your flesh.
<white>You watch, in horror, as your left arm shrivels up and becomes useless.
<white>Tesai presses a caloric poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white>You press a mending poultice against your left arm, rubbing it into your flesh.
<white>The bones in your left arm mend.
<white>You infuse an inscribed bandage with 100 doses of a mending poultice from your fluidcache.
<white><#ff0000>You have 2979 sips remaining in your fluidcache.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;parry head;;bite Tesai scytherus;;suggest Tesai Impatience
<white>When you can act: stand;;parry head;;bite Tesai scytherus;;suggest Tesai Impatience
<white>You will now attempt to parry attacks to your head.
<#e5e5e5>You sink fangs of corrosion into Tesai, injecting scytherus into her veins.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Tesai's mind.
<white>You are again able to absorb a poultice.
<white>Tesai presses a caloric poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai blinks and rubs her eye as she misses you with a throwing axe.
<white>Tesai presses an epidermal poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<white><#ffff00>>>> <white>qeb stand;;dstab Tesai curare kalmia;;suggest Tesai Vertigo
<white>When you can act: stand;;dstab Tesai curare kalmia;;suggest Tesai Vertigo
<white>You envenom your weapon with curare and kalmia.
<#e5e5e5>You jab Tesai with a needle-pointed dirk.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of curare has rubbed off your weapon.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai frowns as she struggles with numbed motion.
<#e5e5e5>Deftly twirling the weapon in your hand, you jab her with it once more.
<#e5e5e5>You discern that a layer of kalmia has rubbed off your weapon.
<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Tesai's mind.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai blinks and rubs her eye as she misses you with a throwing axe.
<white>Tesai presses an epidermal poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.
<white>You may influence the shadows once more.
<white>Tesai swoons as she suffers a toxic relapse.

<white>You issue the suggestion, concealing it deep within Tesai's mind.
<#e5e5e5>You order your shadow to surround Tesai in a black void.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai strikes clumsily at you with a throwing axe, completely missing.
<white>Tesai suddenly seizes up, her entire body locked by paralysis.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai inhales deeply, filling her lungs with air.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai takes a long drag off her pipe filled with yarrow.
<#e5e5e5>Tesai presses a caloric poultice against her skin, rubbing the poultice into her flesh.

<white>You draw Tesai out of her hypnotic daze, your suggestions indelibly printed on her mind.
<white>You press a mending poultice against your left arm, rubbing it into your flesh.
<white>The bones in your left arm mend.

<white>Tesai trembles slightly as a yellow jaundice begins to creep through her now-pale features.
<white>Tesai swoons as she suffers a toxic relapse.
<white>Tesai swoons as she suffers a toxic relapse.
<white>Tesai swoons as she suffers a toxic relapse.
<white>Tesai cringes as a dark red rash spreads painfully across her skin.
<white>You have recovered balance on all limbs.
<#e5e5e5>You sprinkle some silvery powder over Tesai and grin widely as she looks about with a look of slight bafflement on her face.
<white>You watch in horror as blood begins to seep from every pore in Tesai's body.
<white>Tesai swoons as she suffers a toxic relapse.
<white>Tesai begins to convulse, and as her mouth opens in a silent scream, you hear a loud snapping as her back shatters from the sheer force of the spasms.
<white>Your insignia glows vividly as your triumph is notated in the records.

<#cdcd00><white>A battered training dummy sits here, awaiting a beating. <#00cdcd>There are 2 key-shaped sigils here. <white>Snorting angrily, a chaos stallion paws at the ground restlessly. <#00cdcd>A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. <white>An arachnid Chiav strider is here, its body armored with overlapping plates. <#00cdcd>A parchment poster hangs here, its face hosting boastful adverts of caravan tours. <white>Prepared for the worst, an armoured mugyik bull of massive proportions stands nearby.

<white>RExits<#cd00cd>You see exits leading COLOR #800080SEND HREF="east"east/SEND/COLOR COLOR #800080SEND HREF="open door east"(closed door)/SEND/COLOR and COLOR #800080SEND HREF="south"south/SEND/COLOR COLOR #800080SEND HREF="open door south"(closed door)/SEND/COLOR./RExits
<#cd00cd>An armored, arachnid Chiav strider chitters rapidly in a series of arachnid clicks at you, before rubbing its pedipalps together.
